text: It's the flagship H&M in Singapore with 4 storeys of 2 Women, 1 Men and 1 Kid sections. All the best sale items can be found here!

Underground train system better than Japan,New York,England.....!Is clean , safety,on time,cheap ,signboard every indication as you walk about ,no worry you will get lost....entrance and exit we'll plan.Most important is so clean better than American and England yet so advance in Singapore.

A very disappointing that can feel that it is running down, especially not allowing to smoke,  it turn off the trousers,  and all the building has changed especially the heritage Mandarin Hotel has sold off and the outlook is like a shopping mall.
Our teenage memories have washed away.

The toilets are sometimes very disgusting - handicapped one especially on the 12th floor stinking of rotten eggs. Some floor do not have hooks to hang bag and with broken toilet roll holder. Wishing there's serviettes to dry hands after hand washing

There's not much going on here, other than some medical clinics. Parking can be a bit of a nightmare, and it's a short walk away from most amenities. There's a 7-11 on the ground floor of this building but that's about it. It's also a little dated, and they're trying to upgrade the lifts during this period. That said, clean, functional, does its job.
